newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary forint ends steady vs dollar and basket.
newsitem.headline: Hungary forint ends steady vs dollar and basket.

text.p: The forint ended Wednesday trade steady both against a bullish dollar and against the currency basket, traders said.
The forint ended at 195.20/25, compared to a midday level of 195.22/27 and an opening of 194.57/62.
"It's all about the dollar/mark again," said Noemi Koppendorfer of ABN-AMRO Magyar Bank. "Things levelled off this afternoon but the feeling is it's still on an upward trend."
Koppendorfer said dollar-buying had subsided during the afternoon as dealers awaited possible comments from the Bundesbank which might bring the dollar down again.
"Whenever we get a surge like this, dealers await comments before the buying interest resumes," she said.
